website_summaries.verdict: The BenQ EW277HDR is a 27-inch high dynamic range monitor that displays colors and blacks well, but comes up short with HDR performance.
pros: Good color accuracy and grayscale performance
cons: HDR performance is only slightly better than standard

customer_reviews.title: Too Easy To Get Used To
customer_reviews.text: My previous 21-inch screens always felt sufficient-to-large but instantly looked tiny with this between them (1st illustration). The amount of screen-space and pixel-count at first felt huge but, unfortunately, I got used to it very quickly. The side-screens now feel cramped whenever they're displaying anything more detailed than thumbnails or YouTube. My greatest fear is that I really, really, want to buy another two of these now but can't afford it! It performs perfectly. Although purists might want a higher refresh-rate if they are mainly playing twitch shooters this has not affected my work, watching videos, the slower/builder games I usually play or ARMA/Tomb Raider/Hitman when I have tried those. (2nd illustration ROTTR)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality is gorgeous. Its also really light - I thought a 32" monitor was going to be really heavy; couldn't believe how light it was when I lifted it out of the box. Makes mounting it on a stand very easy. The picture quality is superb, the resolution amazing - can put a number of windows all on one screen and work just on the one monitor - really useful for work. Lightroom works well using just this monitor; no real need for a second one - its so big and such high res. Love it basically.
customer_reviews.author: abraxis

customer_reviews.title: It is exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: There are people far more knowledgeable than me who have given technical feedback however; my requirements are quite simple - I work with CAD, or PDF, drawings and require a clean high definition monitor and this does the job very well however; there is one thing I did not count on - the graphics card I was using Sapphire Nitro+ Radeon RX580 would not go above 30Hz when this monitor was in 3840 x 2160 resolution so I've also had to update my graphics card to a GEFORCE RTX 2060 as a minimum I do not use this monitor for PC gaming so am unable to comment and therefore no stars
customer_reviews.author: Derek GC White

customer_reviews.title: Ew277hdr: great monitor for the price
customer_reviews.text: Amazon reviews mix the various different benq monitors, which is useless as they are all quite different so I am specifically reviewing the ew277hdr. Basically, it's a great monitor for the price. Details wise, basically go read the various online review articles if you want a proper assessment. But briefly: Contrast is fantastic. HDR is so-so, but I really don't mind because the high contrast looks great anyway. Speakers are fine for loud games/films but annoying in that they're just little too quiet for the quiet moments of films. Viewing angles great, response times seem reasonable to me.
customer_reviews.author: M H

customer_reviews.title: Backlight uniformity issues spoil otherwise great cheap 4K display
customer_reviews.text: Ultimately I returned this as I couldn’t get on with the backlight uniformity issues. Black levels excellent though so if you don’t use lots of white backgrounds this is a super monitor, with great eye care facilities. But I’m looking for a uniform panel, and this just wasn’t it.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Insanity

customer_reviews.title: BENQ EW2780 27” 1080p = pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: The build and finish of this monitor is great and definitely looks good, the screen quality is 1080p so there are better monitors out there if you want to spend more money, I have noticed when using this paired to my MacBook the picture quality can look a little fuzzy around the edges of icons, also the HDRi and low blue light does work well, the 27” has tiny bezels as you will notice in the pictures, the viewing angel is also really good due to the IPS panel. Overall would definitely purchase again, and I’m really happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great choice as second MAC screen
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a second screen for my 27" iMac and it turned out to be an ideal choice. Physical height is similar although the picture area is much larger, especially at 4k resolution. The iMac detected the screen immediately on either HDMI or Displayport inputs and the Mac is almost seamless moving between the 2 screens. Colours are great although I'm not a fan of HDR, far too rich and saturated for me but in standard mode it matches closely the iMac Retina screen which I have set to 3200x1800. Terrific value at under £400
customer_reviews.author: billiedog

customer_reviews.title: Great all purpose monitor.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Looks great, colours are vivid and while it's not strictly a gaming monitor it does well enough for my needs (I play some fast paced games - Rocket League, Destiny 2 and the inbuilt AMA does a fine job of keeping up with the action) as well as being a joy to watch films on. Haven't used HDR so can't comment on that as a feature but overall I'm extremely happy with my purchase (so far).
customer_reviews.author: Almightrex

customer_reviews.title: A great budget monitor.
customer_reviews.text: The wife likes the style and function of the monitor. It took a bit of fiddling about to setup the eye preferences(but it is the same for all users) for her, but she is happy with it as it sits far back to the wall now, vs further forward from her old monitor. The only downside is that there is not up/down adjustment on it, but for the price it is great!
customer_reviews.author: Ranualf

customer_reviews.title: Works great with my ps4 pro
customer_reviews.text: It's not full HDR like 720p is not fullHD, but it does work and the difference between this and standard tv is clear. Netflix and YouTube hdr content all work. Assasins creed, red dead II and modern warfare also worked in hdr mode (so hdr gaming runs fine), and you can tell the difference. Gran tourismo was stunning, got to love those replays . Speakers peform better than expected for such low wattage, if I want loud I have amps/headphones. My nephew tried it and now he wants one.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but not great monitor
customer_reviews.text: Good screen and picture quality - using with a MacBook Pro. Sound quality is Ok for video calls but a bit tinny for watching media. Had some issues with the USB-C connection kept cutting out, but HDMI is working fine. I paid more for USB-C connection. After a couple of weeks of use I now have horizontal black & white lines across the monitor, so now being sent back. Screen seems very flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Tahir

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, stylish monitor - not perfect HDR display
customer_reviews.text: Very decent monitor for the price on offer. The HDR advertised is not perfect however. Some games alleged to support HDR do struggle to display on this monitor and if like mine you'll find yourself constantly in and out of the settings trying to get the right setting for different games and switching between. The style is very good and lightweight. However the frameless edge is a bit strange to get use to. Although the frame is not prominent around the edge the display does not go all the way to the edge of the screen and you are left with a black line. Good colours and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Marchant

customer_reviews.title: Awesome screen for movies and assignments!
customer_reviews.text: The display has really accurate colors, even though not blingy as my phone (samsung s8+). Compared to colours, my phone wins, but compared to size and clarity, this display wins. This display is so accurate that you see too much noise in dark backgrounds, especially on netflix (daredevil s3). Movies are a treat on this thing, but bear in mind you will need good quality movies (blu rays) to make it shine. The gaming aspect is fine, I can see my enemies clearly in rainbow6siege, but I am capped at 60fps. The best part of this display is the eye care. This helped me loads during my long hours of studying, minmal eyestrain if any.
customer_reviews.author: oBLIT

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor for everyday use and speakers are a bonus
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted this monitor for everyday use and it's been excellent. Easy to setup and the built-in speakers are a real bonus. I've really missed having a big screen during lockdown and it's been great using this to connect to my laptop. I use it with a docking station for my work laptop but just connect my personal laptop via HDMI and use a wireless keyboard and mouse. Would recommend to anyone wanting a laptop for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Fay High Wycombe

customer_reviews.title: Good but not that good
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking to buy a gaming monitor this is definitely not the one, it tries emulate HDR and it hurts your eyes, it does have v-sync but if you own a rtx graphic card then you will have problems once it does not work properly with it, only 60 mhz. Overall if you would like to buy it for gaming bear in mind you could find a better monitor for some extra pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Paulo Henrique Braz Alves

customer_reviews.title: Overall a great monitor
customer_reviews.text: Brought this to replace my LG32Ud99w which was consistently faulty. This screen was half the price of that and only slightly lower screen quality. The HDR is good not amazing but you have to expect what you pay for. Overall a great monitor, only negatives are no usb ports and if you are coming from a £1000 grade screen the brightness is not on par but still very good. Build quality seems sound too.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this monitor for gaming (Xbox one X & Xbox series X when available) and so far so good Extremely easy set up, which took a grand total of maybe 45 seconds. Great picture quality, no dead pixels, great brightness and no back light bleed. The HDR function works great, doesn't throw whites out at all which I believe was a problem with models with older software. With the 4K it's absolutely gorgeous picture quality. I took a while to look at reviews for a new monitor at this size with theses specs, I was skeptical at first but now I have made the purchased and set it up completely happy with it and especially and its low price.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Leek - Spooner

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing colours and brightness
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is extremely dim. Compared to my new MacBook the colours are both washed out and dark. Doesn’t appear to be a way for me to significantly change the picture. If it’s bright In the room I struggle to be able to view it. The speakers are terrible in my opinion. Quickly disabled because the sound from my MacBook is 10x better.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Cavell

customer_reviews.title: Overall good monitor
customer_reviews.text: Really good monitor, HDR emulator can take some time getting use to as the colours do change, I’m guessing thats a good thing? But overall happy with it, only downside is when i start my computer the picture seems dull so i have to keep going into settings and change the brightness, personally not a problem but could see it annnoying others.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Stay away if you want a monitor for USB-C convenience
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand the point of a monitor that has a USB-C port but only uses it for display output. I would expect this to charge my laptop too, and ideally for the monitor to have a couple of USB ports (so that it acts as a USB hub), but this Ben Q monitor does not support power delivery (cannot charge laptop) and does not have any USB inputs.
customer_reviews.author: Ataul

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant quality but can't charge laptop while in use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to connect to my 2016 12" MacBook on my office desk. The picture quality is superb and the monitor looks great. The ONLY reason I didn't give 5 stars was because it doesn't supply enough power to my MacBook through the one cable while in use. This means that my MacBooks battery decreases when plugged in so I have to make sure it's juiced up before using the monitor for extended periods. Apart from that, it has been a fantastic addition to my desk. There's also no USB A ports for anyone who wants to use this as a dongle/adapter substitute.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Lobo

customer_reviews.title: Massive difference for photo and video editing
customer_reviews.text: Extra screen dimensions perfect for workflow and multitasking, resolution is very high and ideal for working on visually exacting tasks such as photo and video editing. I won't look back now having moved to this (huge but surprisingly adaptable) screen. The 4K resolution helps with all tasks and makes browsing and quickly moving from one task to another (regardless of the nature of the task) quick and simple - you'll never lose your train of thought flicking between endless tabs!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: If you exclude the gaming gimmicks these are in fact good and accurate monitors
customer_reviews.text: If you want these for professional CAD or photo edit use and don't use the gaming gimmicks so far these have been very good. No dead pixels or sub pixels (class 0), good colour gambit, good viewing angles, uniform screen backlight, reasonable sound. Dual BenQ monitors running UHD from a Dell 9020 is a very nice combination.
customer_reviews.author: Engineer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical initially about the picture and the resolution, but I was very surprised when I first turned this on and the screen auto adjusted itself. I've played various Xbox games with no lags. Also use it with Macbook pro. The adjustment is only vertically. For the price and quality, I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nima 🐨

customer_reviews.title: There is no driver to connect this to an apple mac
customer_reviews.text: Nowhere on the product specification does it say this will not connect to an apple. There is no driver for an apple mac and the manual only refers to windows. It is therefore useless to me and all other apple mac users...
customer_reviews.author: Richard B.

customer_reviews.title: HDMI cuts out every few seconds, then starts working fine, then starts cutting out every few seconds
customer_reviews.text: HDMI cuts out every few seconds, then starts working fine, then starts cutting out every few seconds. Rinse and repeat. Was working fine for a few weeks but evidently the HDMI ports aren't the best built, tried both of them and they don't work. Bought a new HDMI cable from amazon, still has the same issue. Went through 3 cables which all work fine on other TVs but not this. PS4 and Macbook both have issues with this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Screen For Video Work
customer_reviews.text: I decided to get rid of my 2010 Mac and upgrade to a Mac Mini. I bought the best spec Mac Mini, as I intend to use Final Cut Pro to edit 4K video. I then needed an excellent monitor. I spent ages trying to find one but as I had already bought Benq monitors started looking at this one (EW3270U). The price went way down around at the end of November. So bought it. Really pleased that I bought it. Very easy to set up and everything just looks brilliant. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: graham rogers

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Pros - Comes with a free hdmi cable No dead pixels 3 hdmi Slim Easy UI Great sound for built in speaker Cons Light bleed... Update: Replacement arrived, still had backlight bleed but wasn't as bad the first, barely noticeable. Thank you Amazon for great customer service and speedy replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Zibb

customer_reviews.title: Good colors, useful auto-adjusting brightness features
customer_reviews.text: Was looking to get a low-budget IPS monitor for general purpose/video watching use, this monitor fits perfectly. Thin frame looks very nice, colors look good, and really like the auto adjusting brightness feature (like the auto-adjust brightness on phones) to fit whether my room is bright or dark. Benq never disappoints
customer_reviews.author: Long Y.

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad for a very large flat screen.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the EW327OU 32” Monitor to use with my desk top PC which I use mostly for gaming. It is definitely a big screen, but if your buying for PC use you might want to consider going with the 28”, (I kinda wish I did now). Picture quality seems ok, but not as good as I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: "adventuregirl7"

customer_reviews.title: Display is good but built-in peakers are bad
customer_reviews.text: Excellent display and latency. Different display setting for different usage and purpose. HDR content looks good. But the Built in Speakers gone just after a week of usage. So go for it only for display purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Christopherpraveen

customer_reviews.title: Good build quality
customer_reviews.text: This a decent monitor and very good build quality. The 4K and HDR performance is very good. My only criticism is that the USB-C does not deliver power to charge my MacBook Pro which is why I sent this monitor back.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Amazing monitor for the price considering the specs. Only downside is the HDR is pretty much a lie. Photo mode is the only good mode to use without calibration but it does the job just fine and has fairly similar colour reproduction in comparison to my MacBook. I would without a doubt recommend this monitor unless you have a considerably higher budget.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful monitor
customer_reviews.text: For a cheapish monitor this is a jack of all trades. By no means a gaming monitor but games are playable. Picture quality is great for SUB 2k plenty of settings to get the screen looking how you want. The eye care feature is something that I now struggle without on any other monitor. For a word screen this has been excellent. And it's one of the nicest looking monitors I have seen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING GRAPHICS.
customer_reviews.text: For the price you can't go wrong. The monitor has 2 hdmi ports which no monitors have these days which is really useful as i use it for my pc and playstation. The built in speakers are really loud and the audio quality is good. For gaming use it's perfect, as you can change to game mode.
customer_reviews.author: ER

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor, few minor issues but still good value
customer_reviews.text: Only have some minor complaints with this monitor, I can't have brightness/contrast as far down as I like since the dark/black colours bleed and after only a few months there is a dead pixel (barely noticeable, in the top right corner but if there are more in the future it could become a problem). Other than that I'm pretty please with this monitor, so long as you don't mind fiddling with your settings to fix the colour bleed it's pretty decent for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for great price
customer_reviews.text: Nice monitor and great price. 3 hdmi ports a bonus. Easy navigation buttons and quality of picture very good. Would not hesitate to recommend this monitor
customer_reviews.author: C. C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant monitor
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome screen. Get no issues with headaches when using it for hours on end. Really clear and crisp and also the sound quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Rob Shill

customer_reviews.title: Nice big good quality screen.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good am connecting with alternative method to hdmi to enhance gaming experience. Good value for money recommended.
customer_reviews.author: The Bolt

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with the picture quality.
customer_reviews.text: I like the BenQ screen. It is as I wanted a large (32) screen, HD with a good quality colour definition. It will take me time to find out if it is good for photo editing. I am sharing it with my son, who uses it for gaming. He is happy with the quality of screen images.
customer_reviews.author: L HENEHAN

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up, providing you have the correct cable interface.
customer_reviews.text: The product was just right but what I liked most was the sales support I had from the BENQ salesman - sorry I can't remember his name - who told me the model I was looking at was not compatible with my MacPro and would ring me back after some research to find a compatible one. This he did and for a very reasonable price and worked just fine for my photography editing. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Molnar

customer_reviews.title: Great for working from home, great picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this monitor to work from home. Colour is great and picture quality is very good, better than my laptop! I used a bracket to hang the monitor on the wall to save desk space. Monitor does not have USB but my wall socket does so I am able to use my Firestone in the hdmi and double the monitor up as a tv! Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sonal Maisuria

customer_reviews.title: No VESA Mount
customer_reviews.text: Amazon website clearly states VESA mount but this is not true. If I had time to send back and purchase aa different model with the mount I would have
customer_reviews.author: Mearglen

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This is not a good screen. In the process of gently trying to tilt the screen it cracked. The worse is that you cannot get hold of anyone to report this.
customer_reviews.author: EastWest

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for work!
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is perfect for working long hours, mainly due to it's photosensitive sensor that automatically sets the brightness levels depending on the light conditions of the room you are in. Can't recommend enough this monitor to anyone that needs a monitor for working from home.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Cunha

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor, looks fabulous with 4k input.
customer_reviews.text: Really lovely monitor, works perfectly with my macbook pro 13" touchbar and gives a huge screen to work with. Expensive but worth it if you spend a lot of time in front of a computer.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great value 4K monitor
customer_reviews.text: Great 4K monitor, got it on Black Friday deal for £300 excellent picture quality
customer_reviews.author: Dicky O

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!
customer_reviews.text: If like me you do gaming and photography then this monitor is a must!!! Speakers aren't amazing but other than that I can't see any other faults However, it isn't great for video editing but if you run multi-screens this would be a great addition
customer_reviews.author: Ben H.

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: Excellent monitor, really pleased with the sound and picture. I'm sure serious gamers will be able to criticise it on fine details but as a monitor for my very young kids to play games on and for us to play films on, I feel I've gotten a lot for the money.
customer_reviews.author: PJD

customer_reviews.title: Not true 4K
customer_reviews.text: Not true 4K resulting in inferior resolution. You can find better for less money.
customer_reviews.author: A Common Person

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive eyes
customer_reviews.text: No pwm, but still not good for my sensitive eyes. But the picture quality is beautiful. Returned and got another monitor
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: Good performance for gaming and daily use
customer_reviews.text: This 4K monitor is very good for gaming and daily use. I can easily switch between PC and Xbox. The HDR mode will be switched automatically. The colour is better than other product at the same price level.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Peng

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: It has vivid colours and also high quality speakers. Using it daily and doesn’t cause headache or eye strain.
customer_reviews.author: Behzad

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to go for a 27” 1080p instead of 24” 1440p or 24” 144hz because I’m always playing and watching movies, its well made and looks gorgeous, ever wanted to pull the trigger for a BenQ and it worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Moises Freitas

customer_reviews.title: Lovely monitor, but the USB-C doesn't support charging
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic screen mostly, but the primary reason I bought this was for the USB-C connectivity. I thought that the USB-C standard included the ability charge laptops, but it doesn't. It's an option, and unfortunately, this monitor doesn't have that option.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is amazing but on 4K it lags a bit
customer_reviews.author: Pt

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant. I use this for xbox one x , ps4 pro and pc. I upgraded from a sony 32"1080p tv to this. The colours and amount of detail in the picture are a game changer. Freesync works perfectly and Ive had no issue's with input lag or ghosting. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent resolution
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful screen, I use it for gaming, the resution is high enough to turn off anti aliasing, its vivid and sharp. The only negative is that the built-in speakers are not very good. However it's hooked up via Bluetooth and this is not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Evans

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant screen - easy to set up - great Prime offer ... a must buy if you want to upgarde your screen. This one has speakers - even better
customer_reviews.author: D Hart

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Did a great deal of searching. This is great quality. Buy this, you will not be disappointed. Great value and great quality
customer_reviews.author: Dr A.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price you pay
customer_reviews.text: I did a bit of research while I was looking for <£200 screen monitor to play my PS4 games. This one is quite good at that price point, it's really well designed and good picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: Helder

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Wow, tricky monitor controls, but 10 out of 10 for everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Taylerson Clark

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: for a 24 inch screen with speakers this is excellent value. comes with 3 HDMI connections , no 15 pin plug.
customer_reviews.author: Shabbir G

customer_reviews.title: It's good
customer_reviews.text: Yeah it's good, HDR is pretty nice, makes some games and films look really nice, but that's if they pick up that it is a HDR capable monitor, Modern Warfare 2019 doesn't pick this up for me.
customer_reviews.author: Callum McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Great overall
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality and very crisp/clear picture, definitely recommend as a gaming monitor
customer_reviews.author: Akrum Abourawi

customer_reviews.title: Dead on arrival.
customer_reviews.text: Monitor completely damaged on arrival. Would like a prompt replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this having had used one before. Very nice high quality monitor. Picture quality is excellent and haven’t had any eye fatigue while using this monitor even for extended periods of time. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: A great screen!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research into screens and I am not disappointed. Highly recommended as a second screen for office use.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca J

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't have asked for better
customer_reviews.text: Some of the reviews may put you off about the HDR and backlit issues but i've honestly noticed none of this. I use this for my PS4 pro and it looks fantastic. One of the best monitors at this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Non-uk compatible 2 pin plug - returned
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a non-uk 2 pin plug option contrary to the description of the item. No uk plug option was included. Returned
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: Really good monitors!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for a dual-screen setup, extending a macbookpro display. Really good monitors, excellent clarity and overall wear. Look good too.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Odendaal

customer_reviews.title: very happy
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the picture quality especially for the price
customer_reviews.author: aimee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent monitor. My only problem is the sound isn’t the best. Excellent price too.
customer_reviews.author: yassine sobh

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: I like the design and 2 HDMI port for my switch and PS4. Only the speaker is not clear enough but it is no big deal for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor, not the best imagine quality but still better than others at this price point
customer_reviews.author: Stadden Tech

customer_reviews.title: Screen is big, clear and bright
customer_reviews.text: I use it as my primary monitor for programming, love it.
customer_reviews.author: Cristian Greco

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic monitor
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a badly damaged box fortunately the monitor was fine but I ordered the wrong monitor
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Backlight bleeding
customer_reviews.text: The colour is not too bad but with a horrible backlight bleeding problem. I have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Wei Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Good features include flicker free back light
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my children aged 6 and 9. Good features include flicker free back light, low blue light and vibrant colours. However, my main issue is that although the product description on Amazon states "VESA wall mount compatibility", I don't see anywhere to attach the VESA mount. The monitors are just not positioned right. Does anyone know how to VESA mounts would attach?
customer_reviews.author: Derrick

customer_reviews.title: Bad hdr bad colors
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed for this monitors. The hdr mode looks so blue and dark. Even I play FIFA 18 on my Xbox x. I don’t know why I can’t setting brightness in the game. And I can’t close hdr mode in game. It’s ridiculous! I’m so sad for this.
customer_reviews.author: kim1240

product_meta.title: BenQ EW277HDR 27 Inch FHD 1080p HDR Video Enjoyment Monitor Eye-Care 93 Percent DCI-P3 B.I. Plus Sensor - Black
product_meta.description:
